verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
He is Lord He is Lord
He is risen from the dead
And He is Lord
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Lord

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
King of Kings
Lord of Lords
you are rinsen from the dead
and You are Lord
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tounge confess
that Jesus Christ is Lord

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He is Love He is Love
He is Comforter and Friend
And He is Love
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is Grace He is Grace
He has sacrificed His life
And He is Grace
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
He is Hope He is Hope
He has opened up His arms
And He is Hope
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Hope

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
He is Peace He is Peace
He's the calm amid the storm
And He is Peace
Ev'ry knee shall bow
Ev'ry tongue confess
That Jesus Christ is Peace

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
you are Lord
you are Lord
you are risen from the dead
and you are Lord
every knee shall bow
every tongue confess
that Jesus Christ is Lord
